value.title: EasyMile Self-Driving Shuttles Add Seatbelts To Get Back In Operation
value.excerpt: EasyMile shut operations due to a sudden-stop incident. It's coming back, adding seatbelts. But is the very idea of the "transit stop" where you drop off and pick up passengers the flaw? Can 21st century transit have minimal stops and thus be safer?

value.title: As Waymo resumes self-driving tests, backup drivers are still worried about the virus
value.excerpt: Waymo is planning to resume testing its autonomous vehicles in Arizona on May 11th, nearly two months after pausing its robotaxi service as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic. But some of the company’s backup drivers are worried that Waymo may be rushing back into service too quickly.

images.title: As Waymo resumes self-driving tests, backup drivers are still worried about the virus
